attributes.title: i can’t believe this😒
attributes.review: i downloaded this app like a sensible American citizen 🇺🇸 but the first thing that i saw was a confederate flag🤢 what a HORRIBLE DISPLAY OF AMERICAN HISTORY. YALL DIDN'T EVEN WHEN THE WAR. So after looking through the app some more I found some pictures (that were very inappropriate) of Trump. When i filed a complaint they said they would come to my house and plant we*d in my house to get me into jail. 🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺VERY HORRIBLE APP AND HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! IF I COULD RATE THIS APP ZERO STARS I WOULD😡😡😡 BUT ILL JUST HAVE TO SETTLE FOR THIS🗑🗑🗑🗑🗑

attributes.title: Where’s Perry?
attributes.review: When I first opened it, The first thing that popped up was Perry the Platypus TWERKING! What horrible, disgusting person would do this to an app? Then Perry proceeds to come out of my charging hole and eat my turkey sandwich! Like dude! THAT WAS MY SANDWICH! Then Perry goes back in my phone and starts eating a Krabby Patty, Then Spongebob comes in my phone and cooks Mr. Crabs and puts him in a Krabby Patty then I realize what Perry is eating! I am very traumatized by this and I am needing therapy for the next 4 months and 21 days! Worst app ever!

attributes.title: Terrible app needs to be deleted.
attributes.review: When I first saw this app I could just tell that it was gonna be a bad app. The design of the icon is just terrible. I could throw up looking at it. It does not deserve to be on this App Store. Along with all the other reviews that think so this is just a waste of time. If you’re going to make an app make a good one that actually deserves to be on the app store🙄 a huge waste of time. Never get this app.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: when i got the app i thought it was going to run fine . i was scrolling and i saw something orange on my screen and it startled me very badly because it was blinking . it glitched my phone very badly and i had to get the barack obama app to stop my phone from glitching . i really do not recommend getting this app because it will break your phone . if it does, just get the barack obama app . i’m sure it works fine after 🧚‍♂️💅🏾💖🙉👁👄👁✨😎 .

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: I opened this app to see fake news it’s awful. It keeps glitching and Donald trump keeps lying to his supporters. He’s a fake. I tried to listen to some of his videos but he contradicts himself every time he speaks. This awful Cheeto has to go I would give zero stars if possible

attributes.title: Best app ever no cap
attributes.review: I have seen a video of people only giving this a one star review so this app will get deleted on Apple millions of people are doing it so Trump supporters who read this do your thing and bring this apps rates back up 🇺🇸

attributes.title: Ugly orange potato🍊🍊
attributes.review: This app is probably the most worst app in the world. No only does a ugly rotten orange🍊own the app but it made my eyes bleed👁👄👁🩸See I have this rare disease were when I look at trash🚮they bleed🩸. So that’s why I try to stay as far as I can get from seeing the orange🍊. I know I’m not the only one with this disease, because it’s very common. So plz tell this 100 year old orange 🍊👴to take this app off the App Store because it’s hurting all of us😭😭. Save yourself👺👺

attributes.title: No honey no
attributes.review: This app is not it no one wants to see a crusty musty old orange! We sure want to see Barron tho 👀❤️trump wants to take down tiktok so we take down his app how is a 70 something year old man gonna be scared of teens and kids that he has to take down a APP you sighed up for this job do it right or just leave cause I wish it was that easy to leave and make sure you find out who found this land and that’s from a 11 year old 🤭🤡💫✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: DO NOT OPEN IN FRONT OF YOUR KIDS
attributes.review: Where do I even start. This app is disgusting and rude. I downloaded it to support my president and when I first opened it I was going to show my kids and all of a sudden A PORNO CAME ON SCREEN!!!🤬My child now has the image of two lesbians together in the kitchen. I am thinking about sueing... DO NOT PURCHASE! Other than that issue, this app does not serve a purpose and completely irresponsible and since Trump made this, I am completely embarrassed by him. IMPEACHMENT!!

attributes.title: Digusting 🤮🤮
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app and before I could even open it my house blew up 💥⬆️. Then people dressed in blonde wigs 👱‍♂️and orange paint 🟧🎨 came and took everything that wasn’t destroyed. Then I was abducted by aliens 👽and they gave me right back because the app killed ⚔️🩸all their young👼. My phone 📲looked like a little samurai.  I am highly 💁‍♂️ disappointed 🙅‍♂️ that this is what happens when you download this. 10/10 would not recommend 💯.
